name: Black Crystal Ball of Arcane Detection

description.value:
Wondrous item, very rare (requires attunement)
This black crystal ball is about 6 inches in diameter. While touching it, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.GRLnRMB9C9gU2PHq]{scrying} spell (save DC 17) with it.
You can use an action to cast the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.jhMAM81keoyqBzsy]{detect magic} spell while you are scrying with the crystal ball, sensing the presence of magic within 30 feet of the spell’s sensor. You don’t need to concentrate on this detect magic to maintain it during its duration, but it ends if @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.GRLnRMB9C9gU2PHq]{scrying} ends. Once used, the detect magic power of the crystal ball can’t be used again until the next dawn.
Curse. The crystal ball is cursed, and its magical nature is hidden. @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.jhMAM81keoyqBzsy]{Detect magic} doesn’t detect it. An identify spell reveals the true nature of the curse. Whenever you activate the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.GRLnRMB9C9gU2PHq]{scrying} or @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.jhMAM81keoyqBzsy]{detect magic} abilities of the crystal ball, you must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or take 2d8 points of psychic damage.
